attributes.action: Make More shelters for the homeless
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Have you ever been walking down your local high street and someone has asked you for money or food?

Have you ever walked down the street and seen someone layed in an alleyway?

If so please sign this petition for more homeless shelters.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
